name: Bootstrap Portfolio
description: Designed a Bootstrap portfolio to replicate the site I built using HTML and CSS

name: FlickFinder
description: This group project uses mutliple APIs to create a movie recommender website.

name: Curated
description: This was a team project that utalises the HARVARD API, Tailwind, React slick, lazyloading and email.js.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Open Weather Map API to show the forecast in different cities for the next five days. Users empty the city, or choose from their recent searches and the current and future weather data displays.

name: Python Adventure Game
description: This was a group project to develop an adventure using Python programming.

name: JavaScript Quiz
description: This is a site built using Dayjs to create a responsive daily planner. It allows users to see the current time and log events throughout the day, past events display in a different colour.
